thread.title: Image of Asia: Looking through the 'Mirage'
thread.title_full: Image of Asia: Looking through the 'Mirage' - KPTV - FOX 12

author: cbs8
title: Image of Asia: Looking through the 'Mirage'
text:
By The Associated Press
In this photo by Rick Rycroft, a fisherman walks by a photographer taking pictures of an art installation called "Mirage" on the beach in Sydney. The Sculpture by the Sea exhibition includes 107 works by Australian and international artists. The sculptures will be displayed on Sydney's beaches and coastal walks until Nov. 8. German sculptor Jorg Plickat won the exhibition's major prize and $60,000 prize for "Divided Planet," a rusted steel structure he described as a fragmented sphere reflecting the world's divisions. Plickat said the start of a millennium brought hope that people would solve the planet's problems but instead we see more division. "So it is artists' demand to the politicians to give better answers to what our planet needs," he said.
